//TITLE :
//DATE: 
//Platform: 
import java.io.*;
import java.math.*;
import java.util.*;
class Solution
{
public static void main (String[] args)throws IOException
{
try{
BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
int t=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
while(t!=0){
int i,j,count=0;
int arr[][]=new int[9][9];
String ip[]=new String[8];
ip=br.readLine().split(" ");
for(i=0;i<8;i++){
	int x=Integer.parseInt(ip[i]);
	arr[i+1][x]=1;
}
int temp=0,sum=0,k;

for(i=1;i<=8;i++){
	sum=0;
	for(j=1;j<=8;j++){
		sum+=arr[i][j];
	}
	if(sum!=1){
		temp=1;
		break;
	}
}
if(temp==1)
System.out.println("No");
else{
	sum=0;
	temp=0;
	for(i=1;i<=8;i++){
	sum=0;
	for(j=1;j<=8;j++){
		sum+=arr[j][i];
	}
	if(sum!=1){
		temp=1;
		break;
	}
}
if(temp==1)
System.out.println("No");
else{
	sum=0;
	temp=0;
	for(k=-7;k<=7;k++){
		sum=0;
	for(i=1;i<=8;i++){
		for(j=1;j<=8;j++){
			if(i-j==k)
			sum+=arr[i][j];
		}
	}
	if(sum>1)
	{
		temp=1;
		break;
	}
}
if(temp==1)
System.out.println("No");
else{
	sum=0;
	temp=0;
	for(k=2;k<=16;k++){
		sum=0;
	for(i=1;i<=8;i++){
		for(j=1;j<=8;j++){
			if(i+j==k)
			sum+=arr[i][j];
		}
	}
	if(sum>1)
	{
		temp=1;
		break;
	}
}
if(temp==1)
System.out.println("No");
else
System.out.println("Yes");
}
}
}
t--;
}
}catch(Exception e)
{return;}
}
}
//status:
